title: Shanahan keeps stalled Leafs season in perspective - Toronto Sun
description: Shanahan keeps stalled Leafs season in perspective Toronto Sun Shanahan, Maple Leafs ‘certainly interested’ in keeping Clifford Sportsnet.ca The Most Underrated Toronto Maple Leafs of All-Time Editor In Leaf Shanahan’s Maple Leafs expect to play again this se…
content: Working from the confines of home amid a pandemic Brendan Shanahan knows the hibernation of Leafs Nation is hardly deserving of front page coverage At a time Toronto s hockey team would be marshalling for a possible playoff run COVID has slowed operati chars
